comet-ml/opik

Open-source platform for evaluating and optimizing LLM apps

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Opik MCP server for IDE integration and unified access to prompts, projects, traces, metrics
  • Benchmark for LLMs on software engineering tasks
  • toolkit for evaluating and optimizing LLM and RAG apps
  • Benchmark for evaluating LLMs on real-world GitHub issues
  • Open-source unified API for integrating data sources with LLMs
  • Open source platform for developing, monitoring, and debugging LLM apps
  • minimal LLM chat app runs in your browser, supports Ollama and OpenAI, multi-server, text and vision models
  • OpenAI-compatible proxy that boosts LLM reasoning accuracy with 20+ optimization techniques, no retraining needed
  • Platform for building private LLM apps with RAG and multi-agent automation
